item.title: Poco unveils M7 Pro and C75 with 5G chipsets and Sony cameras: Check price, specs and other details - The Indian Express
item.description:
Poco unveils M7 Pro and C75 with 5G chipsets, Sony cameras: Check price, specs and other details

Publication Date: Today
Source: Indian Express

Poco has launched two new budget smartphones, the M7 Pro and C75, with 5G capabilities and Sony cameras, targeting budget-conscious consumers.

  • The Poco M7 Pro features Dimensity 7025 Ultra chipset and a 6.67-inch 120Hz gOLED screen with FullHD+ resolution and HDR10+ support.
  • It includes a dual rear camera with a 50MP Sony camera and a 20MP selfie shooter, along with a 5,110mAh battery supporting 45W fast charging.
  • The Poco C75 is powered by Snapdragon 4s Gen 2 chipset, has a 6.88-inch 120Hz LCD screen, and features a 50MP rear camera.
  • Both models run on Xiaomi's HyperOS based on Android 14 and promise multiple years of software updates.
  • The M7 Pro is priced at Rs 13,999 for the 6GB+128GB model and Rs 15,999 for the 8GB+256GB variant, while the C75 starts at Rs 7,999.
“Poco M7 Pro will get two years of Android updates and four years of security patches.”

The new models emphasize enhanced camera capabilities and display quality, catering to users looking for budget-friendly smartphones with powerful features.

item.title: iPhone 16 available at the price of iPhone 15, find out where to buy - India TV News
item.description:
iPhone 16 available at the price of iPhone 15, find out where to buy

Publication Date: December 2024

Source: India TV News

The iPhone 16, only months after its release, is now available at the same price as the iPhone 15. Consumers can find significant discounts on Amazon, while Flipkart maintains the original price.

  • The iPhone 16 is listed for as low as Rs 77,400 on Amazon.
  • There is an additional instant discount of up to Rs 5,000, leading to a final price of Rs 72,400.
  • Three storage options are available: 128GB, 256GB, and 512GB.
  • Features include a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, A18 Bionic chip, and AI capabilities.
  • The dual-camera system includes a 48MP main camera and supports USB Type-C fast charging.
“If you're looking to snag the iPhone 16, which features AI capabilities, now is a great time to take advantage of the offer.”

As the iPhone 16 competes with the iPhone 15, this significant price drop presents an exciting opportunity for consumers.

item.title: Apple reveals the top downloaded apps and games of 2024 - The Times of India
item.description:
Apple reveals the top downloaded apps and games of 2024

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Apple News

The article highlights the most downloaded apps and games of 2024, showcasing trends in app usage and consumer preferences.

  • Top apps include popular social media and productivity tools.
  • Leading games highlight increasing interest in mobile gaming.
  • Data reflects consumer behavior in app selections and downloads.
"The rise of mobile gaming continues to reshape the app landscape." - Apple Executive

This year's list indicates a significant shift towards applications that enhance social connectivity and entertainment.

item.title: Honor GT launched with Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, IMX906 and 100W charging - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
item.description:
Honor GT launched with Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, IMX906 and 100W charging

Publication Date: December 18, 2023

Source: Honor Official Website

Honor’s gaming-focused GT line has released its newest member, the Honor GT, featuring cutting-edge technology for gaming enthusiasts.

  • Powered by Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 with a massive VC heatsink.
  • Features a 5,300mAh silicon-carbon battery with 100W wired charging.
  • Equipped with a 6.7-inch AMOLED screen, FHD+ resolution, and 120Hz refresh rate.
  • Camera setup includes a 50MP main camera (IMX906) and a 12MP ultrawide lens.
  • Available in Ice White, Phantom Black, and Aurora Green colors.
  • Pricing starts at CNY 2,199 ($302) for 12GB RAM and CNY 3,299 ($453) for 16GB RAM with 1TB of storage.
“The device is already available for purchase in China with first deliveries scheduled for December 18.”

In conclusion, the Honor GT offers impressive specifications and performance aimed at gamers, showcasing the latest advancements in mobile technology.

item.title: Realme prepares to launch new smartphone Realme 14x 5G before year-end - DNA India
item.description:
Realme prepares to launch new smartphone Realme 14x 5G before year-end

Publication Date: December 18, 2024, Source: DNA India

Realme has set a launch date for its new smartphone, the Realme 14x 5G, aiming to revolutionize the Indian smartphone market with its affordable pricing and cutting-edge features.

  • The phone will be available at a price under Rs. 15,000.
  • It is the first phone in its segment to feature an IP69 rating, indicating high protection against dust and liquids.
  • Powered by MediaTek Dimensity 6300 processor and equipped with a 6.67-inch IPS LCD display with a 120Hz refresh rate.
  • It comes with a 6,000 mAh battery that supports 45W fast charging.
  • Features a 50 MP primary camera and an 8 MP selfie camera.
  • Sales start at 12 noon on December 18 on the official Realme website and Flipkart.
  • Available in three colors: Crystal Black, Golden Glow, and Jewel Red.
“The Realme 14x 5G delivers a set of premium features at a budget-friendly price.”

This launch is a significant step for Realme as it aims to offer high-quality smartphones accessible to a wider audience, enhancing the competitive landscape of the Indian smartphone market.

item.title: OnePlus 13 series to make its debut on January 7 at the winter launch event - The Indian Express
item.description:
OnePlus 13 series to make its debut on January 7 at the winter launch event

Publication Date: January 7, 2024 Source: Indian Express

On January 7, OnePlus will host a global launch event to unveil its new OnePlus 13 series, featuring the OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R, among possibly other products. The event will start at 9:30 PM IST and will be live-streamed on YouTube.

  • The OnePlus 13 will be powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite chip.
  • The OnePlus 13R will utilize the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, targeting performance-oriented users seeking affordability.
  • Both devices will likely come with the latest OxygenOS 15 update.
  • The OnePlus 13 will feature a 2K quad-curved display, while the 13R will have a 1.5K flat panel display.
  • Improved display technology to prevent green line issues is expected.
  • The OnePlus 13 will have an IP68/69 rating for water and dust resistance.
  • Both models are anticipated to support a 6,000 mAh battery with 100W fast charging.
  • The OnePlus 13 will also feature 50W wireless charging.
"These smartphones will also come with improved display technology, making them resilient against green line issues."

The upcoming OnePlus 13 series aims to offer advanced features while catering to both flagship and mid-range markets, highlighting OnePlus's commitment to innovation and user experience.

item.title: Apple App Store’s Top Apps and Games of 2024 in India Announced: WhatsApp, Instagram, BGMI and More - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Apple Reveals the Most Downloaded iPhone Apps and Games of 2024 in India

Date: December 2024 Source: Gadgets360

Apple has announced its annual report on the most downloaded apps and games on the App Store for the year 2024, highlighting significant trends in mobile app usage among Indian users.

  • WhatsApp is the top free iPhone app, followed by Instagram, YouTube, and Google Pay.
  • Forest: Focus for Productivity is the most downloaded paid app.
  • BGMI (Battlegrounds Mobile India) is the most downloaded free game on iPhone, while Minecraft tops the paid games list.
  • The top games on Apple Arcade include Getting Over It+ and NBA 2K24 Arcade Edition.
“Notably, Hitman Sniper was the most downloaded paid game last year but was dethroned by Minecraft in 2024.”

This year's rankings showcase the evolving preferences of app users in India, with a focus on productivity and gaming.

item.title: Direct retail inflows hit a three-year high at nearly ₹1 trillion | Stock Market News - Mint
item.description:
Direct retail inflows hit a three-year high at nearly ₹1 trillion

Publication Date: 2023

Source: Stock Market News

Retail investors trading directly on NSE have made record investments, indicating growing confidence in market dynamics.

  • Retail investors accumulated nearly ₹1 trillion worth of shares between April and November.
  • This amount nearly matches total retail purchases from the last two financial years combined.
  • Approximately one-third of the retail inflows occurred during an October market dip, showcasing investor adaptability.
"Retail investors are becoming savvier and comfortable with market volatility."

This surge in investment reflects a notable behavioral shift among retail investors towards more strategic trading practices.

item.title: Starship will change what is possible beyond Earth | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
Starship will change what is possible beyond Earth

Publication Date: October 15, 2023

Source: Company Business News

This article discusses the significance of SpaceX's recent test flight of the Starship, overshadowing other major space events like the launch of NASA's Europa Clipper. Elon Musk views this achievement not as an end but as the beginning of a new era in space exploration.

  • The Europa Clipper launched on October 14, 2023, to search for signs of life.
  • Starship aims to deliver eight times more mass to orbit compared to Falcon 9.
  • SpaceX intends to achieve a launch cadence of more than one launch per day.
  • Musk predicts he can reduce launch costs by at least tenfold.
“Seven minutes after take-off a thin, waggling finger of rocket-fire guided the launcher’s huge first stage back to its launchpad in Texas.”

The advancements represented by the Starship test flight hold the potential to radically change space travel and exploration beyond our planet.

item.title: Google's new AI tool 'Whisk' turns images into creative prompts - afaqs!
item.description:
Google's New AI Tool 'Whisk' Transforms Images into Creative Prompts

Publication Date: December 17, 2024 - Source: afaqs.com

Google has unveiled Whisk, an innovative generative AI tool designed to streamline the image creation process by allowing users to drag and drop images for subject and style selection, providing an intuitive alternative to text-based image generators.

  • Whisk is integrated into Google's Labs program and focuses on creative experimentation.
  • The tool uses Google's Imagen 3 model and the Gemini language model for detailed image generation and captioning.
  • It offers options to edit prompts for precision in the generated images.
  • Currently available to US users in the Google Labs program, targeting artists and designers.
  • Whisk is part of Google's ongoing efforts to enhance generative AI capabilities.
"Whisk is a creative tool for generating multiple visual options, rather than a traditional image editor."

Whisk exemplifies Google's dedication to advancing generative AI technologies while inviting user feedback for future developments.

item.description:
Realme 14x 5G Set to Launch on December 18, 2024: Expected Price, Key Specs, and More

Date & Source: December 17, 2024, LiveMint

Introduction: The Realme 14x 5G smartphone is scheduled for release on December 18, 2024. This article provides details about its expected price, key specifications, and other notable features.

Key Points:

  • Expected price under ₹15,000.
  • Powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 processor.
  • Features a 120Hz display.
  • Equipped with a robust 6,000mAh battery.
  • Includes water and dust resistance.

The Realme 14x 5G smartphone, scheduled for release on December 18, will be priced under ₹15,000.

Conclusion: The upcoming Realme 14x 5G smartphone is expected to offer high performance and durability at an affordable price, making it a noteworthy addition to the market.

item.title: iQOO 13 review in 10 points - India Today
item.description:
iQOO 13 Review in 10 Points

Publication Date: December 17, 2024 | Source: India Today

The iQOO 13 has recently been launched in India, featuring high-end specifications and promising performance. This review outlines ten key aspects of the device.

  • Powered by Snapdragon 8 Elite chip.
  • Equipped with a 6000mAh battery and 120W fast charging.
  • Triple camera setup with 50MP primary sensor.
  • 6.82-inch display with 144Hz refresh rate.
  • Customizable Monster Halo lights for notifications.
  • Runs on FunTouchOS 15 based on Android 15.
  • Vivid and crisp camera performance.
  • Price starts at Rs 54,999.
  • Exceptional value for high-end features.
  • Long battery life, lasting up to 24 hours on a single charge.
"Overall, playing with and using the iQOO 13’s camera was really fun. It clicks vivid, crisp and well-detailed images."

The iQOO 13 combines style, performance, and value, making it a compelling flagship in the smartphone market.

item.title: OpenAI makes AI search engine available for all - The Hindu
item.description:
OpenAI Launches AI Search Engine for All Users

Published: December 17, 2024 at 12:15 pm IST | Source: Reuters

OpenAI has announced that it is rolling out its AI search engine to all users starting December 17, 2024. The search engine has been upgraded with new features that enhance user experience.

  • The search engine will provide detailed results for queries such as restaurant searches, including opening hours and reviews.
  • Event searches will display a list of upcoming events with descriptions and links to pages.
  • Navigation features include showing maps and directions within the app when users click on locations.
  • Users can access advanced voice features and up-to-date information while searching.
  • This search engine was previously available to paid subscribers, and it is now accessible to free users logged into their accounts.

Previously, OpenAI has launched an AI video generator named Sora and a premium ChatGPT Pro subscription.
